metadata.title: CVE-2020-8086 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The mod_auth_ldap and mod_auth_ldap2 Community Modules through 2020-01-27for Prosody incompletely verify the XMPP address passed to the is_admin()function. This grants remote entities admin-only functionality if theirusername matches the username of a local admin.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8086` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

prosody-modules - 0.0~hg20200128.09e7e880e056+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: prosody-modules package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0~hg20200128.09e7e880e056+dfsg-1').
